titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain lands in the State of Arizona, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S734)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of Agriculture, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-594.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to convey by quitclaim deed certain lands in Arizona in exchange for administrative improvements for the Coconino National Forest in Arizona.
